attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Eric Sykes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eric sykes has entertained the nation for 60 years, his comic timing is legendary. Not only has he brought laughter to millions for his comic appearances, but has written for so many other comedians. He is a comic genius and should be recognised as such, the only fitting tribute would be to give him a knighthood. Let us celebrate all he has given to the world of entertainment now in his lifetime, and not wait to do so in his obituary.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
